post.body: oh god i feel your pain! hate that sort of thing, fake an illness and scarper!
hello Dawie
hey twitterbird you!
interest in solstice for "scientific" reasons or spiritual observance? or just coz?
really was good to be totally "out of it" for a few days. boys love the whole tents and fires and showering in the open thing
been away in the big wide open, missed your little red pooch :-)
jesse bird, dave love!! such a happy2bjes :-))) i shall be happy2bjesfriend ;-)
solstice!! woo hooo! can really only take so much summer.
hello frozen toes!! big sunshine for you. and smiles smiles smiles!
i hope you are given reason for pant pee-ing, hee hee ;-))
i'm going to have a hot bath now, jes says its ok even in summer. i will open window so i don't expire
it would be a very bad idea to hold my breath...
going to have another cup of coffee and try start monday again
aww!! would so love to. would have to win the lottery first tho. :-))
izilokotho ezinhle zamaholide (isizulu)
ri vha tamela nwaha muswa wavhudi (tshivenda)
hope its ok to follow you here, just say if not :-)
ah no! not dark, that came out wrong, just heavy. a full heart does often make it heavy. good things sweet person :-)
...and to you, forgive me for saying but oi hope it brings some lightness to your heart. :-)
new year in knysna davidj, happy happy to you! party at the big tree, no farting now you hear!
feeling a bit melancholy today myself...
naughty? no, i think not, lovely and warm and you, beautiful you :-)
hey jesse sweet! the man is back :-))
hello david! its nice to see you! twitters gonna be a busy place tonight :-)
...being at the top of your page kinda attracts attention, i'm a bit shy really, not in the cute coy way, in the nerdy way
twitter is a tricky beast, you have certainly put knysna on the map but now everyone thinks you're here...
hey! thats la linea! we used to watch him on tv when i was a kid! hello denmark :-)
sometimes our milk tastes like cow. morning!
ah, i truly hope so! time for this south african to lay me down. hope the day brings some sweetness from the man. love love
sterkte
i will go have a drinky poo now and play lego...think i will build a BIG bridge so i drive over the ocean and catch some DMB...
cool baubly thing wot?
Helloo sleepy people!!!
off to the forest for a few days camping. no cell reception, no pc...no twitter :-( family tho :-))
hee hee
tis party time here already so i'll catch you all in 2009
HAPPY NEW YEAR TWITTERERS!
idiot
check this guy out @notdavematthews ...
have just discovered that nothing deleted from twitter is ever really gone. NOTHING people, scary...
